actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-oxepanone polymer with 1,4-butanediol and 5-isocyanato-1-(isocyanatomethyl)-1,3,3-trimethylcyclohexane, 2-ethyl-1-hexanol-blocked.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-oxepanone polymer with 1,4-butanediol and 5-isocyanato-1-(isocyanatomethyl)-1,3,3-trimethylcyclohexane, 2-ethyl-1-hexanol-blocked.

titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-oxepanone polymer with 1,4-butanediol and 5-isocyanato-1-(isocyanatomethyl)-1,3,3-trimethylcyclohexane, 2-ethyl-1-hexanol-blocked.
